name: ASAL Technologies
description:
ASAL Technologies is a software, IT services, and Business Process Outsourcing company in Rawabi, Palestine.

ASAL Technologies is the destination for high-quality, innovative and cost-effective software and professional services. Our highly trained engineers become an extension arm of clients, with high standards in mind that are guaranteed to satisfy even the biggest corporations. All of the is done while supporting our community and cooperating with universities and startups to help the Palestinian IT sector live up to its potential.
